q: Sergio Marchionne used the term" shyster loans" three times Friday in an address at an auto dealer's convention in San Francisco, but he issued a statement the next day expressing his regrets. I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern. I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate, Sergio Marchionne said in his statement.
